repos.name: orchestrator
repos.description: A lightweight bash autonomous coding agents orchestrator.
repos.summary: A lightweight bash orchestrator that routes coding tasks to specialized AI agents (Claude, Codex, OpenCode) with full tool access, managing workflows through a YAML-based task database with support for delegation and dynamic agent profiles. It combines task management, intelligent routing, and autonomous agent execution to automate complex software engineering workflows locally.

repos.name: skills
repos.description: A collection of independent, self-contained skills for AI agents.
repos.summary: A collection of self-contained, modular skills for AI agents that follow the Agent Skills open standard, with each skill documented in its own directory and configured via environment variables. The repository provides a unified setup script that handles dependency checking, API key configuration, and smoke testing across multiple agent platforms including Claude Code, Codex, and OpenClaw. Skills are designed to be independently installable and auditable, allowing users to review code before execution.

repos.name: claudio
repos.description: Personal clawdbot with memory, subagents, cron schedules, projects and configurations.

repos.name: homebrew-tap
repos.description: Homebrew tap for orchestrator

repos.name: meshbot
repos.description: Friendly bot that can autonomously handle tasks or delegate to its smarter friends.
repos.summary: Multi-agent orchestration framework that autonomously handles tasks or delegates to specialized agents based on capabilities, with support for Telegram and Discord integrations, queue management, scheduling, and dynamic agent creation. Built on top of pi libraries with pluggable backends (pi-ai, pi-coding-sdk, pi-subprocess) and persistence options for maintaining state across workflow executions. Enables complex agent-to-agent routing patterns including parallel execution, chained workflows, and iterative self-improvement cycles.

repos.name: smart-money-concepts
repos.description: A TypeScript implementation of Smart Money Concepts (SMC) / ICT methodology for market structure analysis. Detects order blocks, fair value gaps, breaks of structure, changes of character, liquidity grabs, and more.
repos.summary: A TypeScript library implementing Smart Money Concepts (SMC) and ICT methodology for market structure analysis that detects trading patterns like order blocks, fair value gaps, breaks of structure, and liquidity grabs from OHLCV candle data. It offers zero runtime dependencies and supports both real-time streaming updates and bulk backtesting, providing market bias, zone identification, and order block analysis through a simple API.

repos.name: content-course
repos.description: Content Course landing page with Stripe & Solana payments
repos.summary: A high-converting landing page for digital course sales built with Nuxt.js 3, offering both Stripe credit card payments and Solana cryptocurrency options with responsive design and fast load times. Features integrated payment processing, optional course access management via Supabase, and conversion-optimized pricing and copy. Deployable to Vercel with webhook verification for payment security across both payment methods.

repos.name: portfolio-guardian-saas
repos.description: Portfolio Guardian SaaS - Monitor your Solana portfolio 24/7 with AI-powered insights
repos.summary: Portfolio Guardian SaaS is a full-stack web application built with Nuxt.js and Supabase that enables users to monitor their Solana cryptocurrency portfolios with real-time balance tracking, P&L analytics, and AI-powered alerts. The platform supports multiple wallet connections, integrates with Drift Protocol for perpetual position tracking, and offers tiered subscription plans with features ranging from basic portfolio monitoring to unlimited wallets and historical data retention. Deployed on Vercel, it combines Vue.js frontend components with Telegram notifications and voice synthesis capabilities to provide 24/7 portfolio oversight.

repos.name: quant
repos.summary: A quantitative analysis or trading toolkit. The minimal README suggests an early-stage project focused on financial analysis, modeling, or algorithmic trading workflows.

repos.name: mind
repos.description: mind palace / writing / notes

repos.name: bot
repos.summary: A TypeScript trading bot for cryptocurrency markets that supports multiple technical analysis strategies (SMA Crossover, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, SuperTrend, and Smart Money Concepts) and executes trades across different exchanges via CCXT. The bot features real-time market data streaming, YAML-based configuration, and a flexible framework for developing and backtesting trading strategies.

repos.name: passive-trading
repos.summary: A cryptocurrency trading bot written in Python and Rust that operates as a contrarian market maker on perpetual futures derivatives across multiple exchanges including Binance, Bybit, OKX, and decentralized platforms like Hyperliquid. It uses a Martingale-inspired strategy to place grid-based limit orders, automatically doubling down on losing positions to improve entry prices, with optional trailing orders and dynamic market selection. The bot includes a backtester and optimizer written partially in Rust for performance, allowing users to test and evolve trading configurations through evolutionary algorithms.

repos.name: trader-smith
repos.summary: A modular autonomous trading agent for Hyperliquid perpetual futures with advanced market making strategies, comprehensive risk management controls, and real-time monitoring dashboards. Built with Python and featuring a clean separation of concerns, full type annotations, and robust error handling for sophisticated trading operations. Designed as experimental software that can autonomously execute trades with real money, requiring careful risk assessment and user responsibility.

repos.name: solana-vault-example
repos.description: A minimal Solana-based tokenized vault implementation that accepts user deposits, mints vault shares (ERC-4626 style), and enables authorized investment into third-party protocols via Cross-Program Invocation (CPI)
repos.summary: A minimal Solana-based tokenized vault implementation that accepts user deposits, mints vault shares using ERC-4626 style exchange rate math, and enables authorized protocol integration through Cross-Program Invocation. The system uses SPL Token for vault assets and SPL Token-2022 for share tokens, with core instructions for vault initialization, user deposits, and protocol investments. It includes a vault program handling state management and a protocol adapter program demonstrating CPI integration with external protocols.

repos.name: private
repos.summary: A CLI tool for managing privacy and backup operations, providing utilities for secure file encryption and data preservation. Designed to handle sensitive information protection and system backup workflows through command-line interfaces.

repos.name: portfolio
repos.description: Portfolio Manager with multiple strategies with backtests, allocation checks + warning, suggestions for increase/decrease/exit/hedge positions. Deploy strategy using Docker. Built with rust with main focus execution on Solana, using Perps, borrow/lend and yield protocols.
repos.summary: A Rust-based portfolio manager that executes multiple investment strategies on Solana using perpetual futures, lending protocols, and yield farming, with built-in backtesting, allocation monitoring, and position management recommendations. The system performs automated risk checks, generates warnings for portfolio imbalances, and suggests tactical adjustments for positions. Deploy strategies via Docker for production execution.

repos.name: home
repos.description: Home Containers
repos.summary: A collection of containerized services for running a home server infrastructure. Provides modular, isolated environments for hosting various self-hosted applications and services. Enables simplified deployment and management of multiple services on personal server hardware.

repos.name: lulo-cpi-example
repos.description: Lulo Example CPI Integration
repos.summary: A Solana program demonstrating user vault integration with Lulo protocol through cross-program invocation (CPI), allowing users to deposit funds, transfer to Lulo for interest earning, and withdraw with async settlement when vault liquidity is insufficient. The example showcases how protocols can implement vault mechanics with yield generation and can be adapted for protocol reserves where only admins manage deposits and withdrawals.

repos.name: bliv
repos.summary: A DeFi yield liberation platform built on Solana with Anchor smart contracts and a Next.js frontend. The project provides tools for users to optimize and access decentralized finance yields through both a web application and CLI interface. It includes a local validator setup for development with demo markets and comprehensive testing capabilities.

repos.name: bean
repos.description: Personal (or not) finance, accounting, defi/quant investments, projects and ideas.
repos.summary: Personal finance and investment tracking system combining beancount accounting, quantitative stock screeners, and portfolio analysis tools for managing finances, tracking transactions, and analyzing investment opportunities across multiple markets including B3 and US equities.

repos.name: mev
repos.summary: A Rust-based MEV bot template for Solana that provides boilerplate setup for Jito searcher and geyser clients, allowing developers to build backrunning arbitrage bots that identify and capitalize on price imbalances from large trades across Raydium, Orca, and other DEX platforms. The repo pins shared dependencies and includes a reference implementation of a backrun arb bot targeting SOL/USDC trades.

repos.name: defi-automator
repos.description: Manage your DeFi like a quant fund
repos.summary: A tool for automating DeFi portfolio management on Solana's Orca Whirlpools, enabling users to create concentrated liquidity positions using algorithmic strategies with auto-rebalancing and fee collection. Currently supports strategies like "One Tick Lower" and "One Tick Upper" for passive yield generation, with plans to expand to additional protocols and chains. Built with Node.js, MongoDB, and the Solana CLI, it runs as a scheduled worker that manages positions every 15 minutes.

repos.name: solana-nft-marketplace
repos.description: NFT marketplace contract on Solana
repos.summary: An NFT marketplace smart contract built on Solana using Anchor 0.18.2 that enables users to list, purchase, and manage NFT sales with automatic marketplace fee collection and royalty payments. The contract supports core marketplace operations including price updates, listing cancellations, and peer-to-peer NFT transactions. Originally developed in 2021 for a hackathon, it may contain outdated patterns relative to current Solana best practices.

repos.name: classification
repos.summary: A Laravel-based system for classifying company attributes using an attribution classifier that processes company data and stores results in the Company model. The project includes feature tests to validate the classification logic and provides a command-line interface via PHPUnit for running the test suite.

repos.name: gabrielkoerich
repos.summary: A technical profile and portfolio of an experienced software engineer with 17+ years of development experience, specializing in Rust and Solana ecosystem development. Currently architecting DeFi protocols at Lulo while leveraging expertise in financial systems and scalable blockchain solutions. Previously founded Bulldesk, a marketing automation SaaS acquired in 2021.

repos.name: bulldesk-gridsome
repos.summary: A Gridsome starter project that combines Vue.js, GraphQL, and Bootstrap to generate static websites with built-in CMS integration via Forestry.io, Netlify forms, and Google Analytics. It provides a fully-configured development environment with Markdown support and automatic sitemap generation, designed for easy deployment to Netlify with minimal setup required.

repos.name: granatum-php
repos.description: A PHP 7+ library for the Granatum API.
repos.summary: A PHP 7+ library that provides integration with the Granatum API for financial management operations. It enables developers to interact with Granatum's financial services programmatically within PHP applications. The library simplifies API communication and data handling for Granatum-based workflows.

repos.name: cross-domain
repos.summary: A fast PHP micro-framework for building web applications with expressive syntax, focusing on streamlining common development tasks like routing, database abstraction, queueing, and caching. Part of the Laravel ecosystem, Lumen is designed to make web development enjoyable and efficient while maintaining simplicity and speed. The framework is open-sourced under the MIT license and actively maintained by the Laravel team.

repos.name: guidelines
repos.description: My PHP, HTML, CSS and Javascript guidelines.
repos.summary: A document containing PHP, HTML, CSS and JavaScript coding guidelines and standards that enforce PSR-2 compliance, consistent indentation, and best practices for a development team. The guidelines cover general contribution workflows via GitHub Flow, naming conventions, documentation standards, and specific style requirements for each language to maintain code consistency across projects.

repos.name: dotfiles
repos.description: Gabriel's config files (zsh, tmux, git, etc) + backups, brew installs, coding agents and macOS setup.
repos.summary: A collection of configuration files and setup scripts for macOS that manages dotfiles, shell environments, terminal tools, and development agent installations through automated syncing and backup systems. Uses Just as a task runner to coordinate installation of dependencies, applications, fonts, and configuration management tools like Mackup. Provides a modular setup process with careful preservation of sensitive files like SSH keys while enabling reproducible system configuration.

repos.name: gabrielkoerich.github.io
repos.description: Projects & Work
repos.summary: Website for gabrielkoerich.github.io.

repos.name: addressing
repos.description: Brazilian postalcode to address in a service manager.
repos.summary: A service for converting Brazilian postal codes to addresses. It provides a simple interface for looking up address information based on CEP (postal code) input. Built as a lightweight utility for Brazilian address resolution.

repos.name: service-manager
repos.description: A simple way to run services in sequence.
repos.summary: A simple service manager that runs services in sequence. It provides a lightweight way to orchestrate and manage the execution of multiple services in a defined order. Licensed under MIT.

repos.name: algorit
repos.description: WIP
repos.summary: A work-in-progress project built with a Vue.js and Sass frontend powered by Laravel Elixir, paired with a PHP and Lumen backend. The stack combines HTML5 templating with Pug and modern JavaScript tooling to create a full-stack web application.

repos.name: cashier-iugu
repos.description: Iugu integration for Laravel Cashier

repos.name: basedash
repos.summary: A PHP-based web application dashboard built with Laravel framework that requires Composer for dependency management and Node.js tooling for asset building. The project includes database migrations, automated testing with PHPUnit, and uses Bower and Grunt for frontend asset management.

repos.name: bovespa.io
repos.description: bovespa.io
repos.summary: A Laravel-based web application for the Brazilian stock exchange (BOVESPA) that provides stock market data and analysis. The project uses PHP for backend services with a Node.js/Bower frontend build pipeline, includes comprehensive testing via PHPUnit, and is deployable with database migrations and seeds for data initialization.

repos.name: algorit.com.br
repos.summary: A Brazilian website domain project without documented purpose or implementation details currently available.
